manage app settings: Manage your application settings and configurations.
select category manage settings: Select a category from the sidebar to manage specific application settings.
configure app settings description: Here you can configure various aspects of your application, from organization details to user management and security.
explore settings navigation left: Explore the settings categories using the navigation on the left.
start by creating new role: You can start by creating a new role.
activity logs appear here: Activity logs will appear here as users interact with the system.
add extra layer security: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
requires verification code: Requires a verification code from your phone.
update password set new: Update your password or set a new one.
see where logged in: See where you are currently logged in.
advanced security settings here: Advanced security settings will be here.
control email notifications: Control which email notifications you receive.
receive email new issue: Receive an email when a new issue is reported in your building.
get emails announcements: Get emails for important building announcements.
receive reminders bill due dates: Receive reminders for upcoming bill due dates.
control sms notifications: Control which SMS notifications you receive.
get sms maintenance work: Get SMS updates for maintenance work affecting your unit.
help improve suggestions: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts and suggestions.
subject: Subject
start by adding new building: You can start by adding a new building.
start by adding new unit: You can start by adding a new unit.
start by adding new user: You can start by adding a new user.
manage all properties portfolio: Manage all properties within your portfolio.
portfolio managed here: Your property portfolio will be managed here.
track manage visitor access: Track and manage visitor access to the property.
visitor logs managed here: Visitor logs will be managed here.
feedback submitted description: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
